nodes.text: A science droid was a type of droid. The Sith Empire utilized multiple science droids aboard the Sith dreadnaught Harbinger, including 8K6 and 8L6. I2-1A was a science droid owned by Nestin Thokor, the Comptroller of the city of Oluna Biqua on the planet Genarius. During the Clone Wars, a type of hovering science droid was used by the Galactic Republic and the Jedi Order.
